about_the_game:
What is Any World?

Any World is an incredible story about an alien named Ottis who ends up on a planet where each location has its own unique visual style! The player will have to go through many challenges, defeat all enemies, explore the planet, and, of course, restore their portal device, with which they can return home... or not? Immerse yourself in the nostalgia for old-school platformers from your childhood!

A humorous but bittersweet story

Ottis was exploring space with the help of a mysterious portal device, but one day he was unlucky and there was a breakdown. Now the little green being will have to jump, run, solve puzzles, help the inhabitants of the unknown planet of Emria with their affairs and fight against hostile entities.

Join Ottis on his exciting journey, where every encounter can change his fate!

Seven islands - seven styles

Each island has in its own style, some of which you may be familiar with, such as the early 2000s graphics.

Aquamarine Expanses - a very wet and dark place. It's better not to go there without special equipment, especially in the ruins of the ancient city, and be careful not to cut yourself on the 2D corals!

Sandy Ridge of Sorrow - a huge space to explore. Afraid of getting lost or getting tired? Use transport to move around the island faster and safer!

Palace of Icy Winds - it's so cold here! Try not to freeze on this island before you find the necessary components for the repair...

These are just a few of the islands that will be in the game, and you'll be able to explore them all by yourself!

Different mechanics for overcoming obstacles and difficulties of the journey

Ottis uses gloves with different power modules: water, light, earth, fire and more. With their help, the hero will overcome obstacles, defeat enemies, and retrieve the items he needs. The in-game currency is coins, which Ottis can use to buy new gadgets, upgrades for them, and much more.

Unique musical accompaniment in each location

Immerse yourself in the amazing world of Any World, where each location has its own unique style and music genre! Every place that Ottis visits will be accompanied by carefully selected melodies and instruments that reflect the atmosphere and character of that location. From jazzy rhythms in cozy towns to mysterious sounds in enchanted forests — each location will offer you a unique musical experience.

And the most interesting part: you can customize your own soundtrack! Just use a music player of Ottis to choose the music that perfectly complements your adventure. Explore the universe of Any World with your own unique musical accompaniment!

name: Any World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Any World is an open-world 3D platformer. Travel through seven unique locations, each with its own style. As the alien Ottis, repair the portal device and uncover the secrets of the planet Emria.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, French, Italian, German
